text: Mu mwaka ogw’ekkumi n’ogumu mu mwezi Buli6:38 Buli Omwezi gwa Buli gwa munaana ku kalenda y’Ekiyudaaya; ku kalenda eya bulijjo gwe gwa Okitobba oba Kafuumuulampawu, gwe mwezi ogw’omunaana, ebitundu byonna ebya yeekaalu ne bimalirizibwa ng’ebigero byabyo bwe byali. Yamala emyaka musanvu ng’agizimba.
